name: Baby Cakes
description:
You are Rocket, a rotten kid who likes one thing more than being mean: Throwing kids into their own birthday cakes. Which I guess counts as being mean...

Learn whose birthday it is and cake that little dweeb!

Arrows to move
X to pick up and throw
C to talk

Art by @Mindysoung

Everything Else by @SirShaneDoyle

Made for Ludum Dare #33

Theme - You are the Monster
